abstract: Latisha Fisher is arraigned on single count of second-degree murder following death of her 1-year-old son in Manhattan restaurant bathroom; prosecutors allege that Fisher smothered son Gavriel Ortiz-Fisher with her bare hands; defense requests psychological evaluation for Fisher, who has been given diagnosis of schizophrenia in past.
lead_paragraph: Latisha Fisher, who had been given a diagnosis of schizophrenia in the past, was arraigned on one count of second-degree murder in the death of Gavriel Ortiz-Fisher, 1.

headline.main: Woman Smothered Son, 1, in Manhattan Restroom, Prosecutors Say
headline.print_headline: Officials Say Mother Smothered Boy, 1, in Restroom

snippet: Latisha Fisher, who had been given a diagnosis of schizophrenia in the past, was arraigned on one count of second-degree murder in the death of Gavriel Ortiz-Fisher, 1.
